## This is an augmented dataset generated via *Back Translation* & *Sentence Swap*

The generation of this dataset is based on the assumption that **Back Translation** & **Sentence Swap** will not change their reading difficulty, aka **readability**. This assumption is indeed valid from my perspective. Hence the model won't memorize the noise nor fit too closely to the original training set with a proper employment of this augmented dataset.
